title: The Magicians of Madh
description: Something strange is afoot at the Royal Academy of Science, Magic and the Arts ...A standing statue sits down with a meditative smile ...A demi-god is caught smuggling the Nectar of the gods into the Mortal Realm ...Traders in Madh find their goods have been turned into djinn's gold ...An illegal portal into the Inter-Realm has opened and no one knows who has done it ...A strange creature has been sighted in the vaults under the Academy ...Will Meenakshi and Kalban be able to get to the bottom of it before the creature in the vault gets too powerful to control?Or is all this a cover for something much more sinisterâ€•something that will destroy the city of Madh?
author: Aditi Krishnakumar
